description: This file declares the interface IEventHandler in the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, defining callback methods for various OCI container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, utilizing JSON data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface defining callback methods for OCI container events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container starts, with container name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container stops, with container name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked upon OCI container failure, with container name and related data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when OCI container state changes, with container name and related data.
